headline: Animal welfare, DEI and more: Banks face votes on hot topics
summary: The largest U.S. banks are facing shareholder votes on a number of politically charged issues — some backed by conservative groups and others championed by organizations with a more progressive bent.

raw.headline: Animal welfare, DEI and more: Banks face votes on hot topics

headline: Trump's Social Security pick promises 'improving service' at agency roiled by upheaval
summary: Frank Bisignano, Donald Trump's pick to lead the Social Security administration, called improving customer service 'a mission critical function' Tuesday even as early Trump administration actions undermined existing service.

headline: Citigroup (NYSE:C) Sees 6% Rise as Nightingale Health ADR Program Launched
summary: Citigroup (NYSE:C) gained 5.86% last week, possibly influenced by the announcement on March 25, 2025, where Citi Issuer Services was positioned as depositary bank for Nightingale Health's ADR program. This client announcement occurred alongside broader stock market trends, wherein the S&P 500 and Nasdaq saw slight increases, reflecting a recovering market sentiment. Furthermore, despite several shareholder proposals facing resistance from Citigroup, investor focus remained on the company's...

headline: Turkey Officials Move to Calm Markets After Imamoglu Arrest
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Turkey’s top economic officials will speak with foreign investors on Tuesday, the latest attempt by the government to calm markets since the detention of a key opposition figure last week triggered billions of dollars in outflows from Turkish assets. headline: Citi Appointed as Depositary Bank for Nightingale Health OYJ’s ADR Program
summary: LONDON, March 25, 2025--Citi Issuer Services, acting through Citibank N.A., has been appointed by Nightingale Health OYJ ("Nightingale Health") to act as depositary bank for its sponsored Level 1 American Depositary Receipt ("ADR") program.
